comment: /**  * Called once a connection was opened  * @param connection the connection  */
code: /**  * Called once a connection was opened  * @param connection the connection  */ default void onConnectionOpened(Transport.Connection connection) { }

comment: /**  * Called once a connection ws closed.  * @param connection the closed connection  */
code: /**  * Called once a connection ws closed.  * @param connection the closed connection  */ default void onConnectionClosed(Transport.Connection connection) { }

comment: /**  * Called once a node connection is opened and registered.  */
code: /**  * Called once a node connection is opened and registered.  */ default void onNodeConnected(DiscoveryNode node) { }

comment: /**  * Called once a node connection is closed and unregistered.  */
code: /**  * Called once a node connection is closed and unregistered.  */ default void onNodeDisconnected(DiscoveryNode node) { }
